department: College of Computing and Digital Media
biography: Amy Nicole Schwartz is a graphic and interaction designer. She received an MFA in Design from the Cranbrook Academy of Art and degrees in Art & Design and Interactive Media from DePaul University. She is a full-time interaction designer at gravitytank and a Programming Chair of AIGA Chicago. She is the founder of Liminal, a community design studio and gallery. Her work has been published by Frame Publishers and Brand New and shown in galleries in Detroit and Chicago. Amy was selected as one of AIGA NY's Fresh Blood 2014 and the winner of AIGA's What Next Grant.
